ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: Renaming of Belongs To column
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Please confirm if bug report does NOT exists already ? - [x] I confirm there is no existing issue for this ### Steps to reproduce ? I use "Has Many" column to link the same table. As a result, I get 2 columns for that, but the second one "Belongs To" marked as system and when I try to rename it, the error `Editing system key not supported` happens. If "Belongs To" column in other table, it is possible to rename it. ### Desired Behavior A possibility to change the name of "Belongs To" column as other ones. ### Project Details Node: **v18.18.2** Arch: **x64** Platform: **linux** Docker: **true** RootDB: **sqlite3** PackageVersion: **0.204.0** ### Attachments _No response_
